text: Darren Paul Jones (born 13 November 1986) is a British Labour politician serving as the Chief Secretary to the Treasury since 2024. Before, he was the Shadow Chief Secretary to the Treasury from 2023 to 2024. He previously served as Chair of the House of Commons Business and Trade Select Committee from 2020 to 2023. He has been the Member of Parliament for Bristol North West since 2017. He was a lawyer specialising in technology law, and worked at Womble Bond Dickinson LLP, before becoming an in-house counsel with BT, advising on data, privacy, cyber-security, telecommunications and consumer law. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:English lawyers Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Politicians from Bristol
title: Darren Jones (politician)
